Smart Oven: A cutting-edge oven that uses AI technology to automatically adjust cooking temperatures and cooking times based on the type of food being cooked. It can also automatically recognize the food and suggest the best cooking methods and recipes.

Multi-Functional Oven: An oven that can perform multiple functions, such as cooking, baking, roasting, and grilling. It can also have a built-in slow cooker, toaster, and warming drawer, making it a one-stop kitchen appliance.
Healthy Oven: An oven that uses a special filtration system to remove harmful toxins and pollutants from the air while cooking, ensuring that the food is not only delicious but also healthy to eat.

Sous Vide Oven: An oven that uses the sous vide method of cooking, which involves sealing food in airtight bags and cooking it in a water bath at a consistent, low temperature. This results in perfectly cooked food with maximum flavor and texture retention.

Oven with Built-In Food Sensors: An oven that has built-in sensors that can detect the moisture, temperature, and cooking time of the food, ensuring that it is cooked to perfection every time. It can also provide recommendations for cooking times and methods based on the type of food being cooked.
